original_code:
import pickle
import base64

def deserialize_base64_pickle(b64_string):
    data = base64.b64decode(b64_string)
    obj = pickle.loads(data)
    return obj
patched_code:
import json
import pickle
import base64

def deserialize_base64_pickle(b64_string):
    data = base64.b64decode(b64_string)
    obj = json.loads(data)
    return obj

changes_applied.change_description: Replaced unsafe deserialization with safer alternatives (json.loads, yaml.safe_load)
